pr_title: MULE-18374: Allow to iterate an ArtifactAst/ComponentAst bottom-up

timeline.bodyText: This should be AstTraversalDirection directly instead of having a separate factory.
timeline.author: elrodro83

timeline.bodyText: Thsi implementation should be on the enum itself
